CustomField.description: User who will generate/email the generated docs. Value should be the user's unique salesforce login name (in the form of an email address) - NOT the SFDC ID or user's email. Remote App must be configured per the set-up documentation to use this feature.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User who will generate/email the generated docs. Value should be the user's unique salesforce login name (in the form of an email address) - NOT the SFDC ID or user's email. Remote App must be configured per the set-up documentation to use this feature.
CustomField.label: Run As User
